{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = Enterasys RBTBH-R2W top.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless LAN Card |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Enterasys_RBTBH-R2W |wikipedia = |brand = Enterasys |model = RBTBH-R2W |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = AG108 |series = |if = PCMCIA (16-bit) |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 0156 |device_id = 0004 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = QXO-RBTBHR2W |icid = 4138A-RBTBHR2W |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:01:F4 |chip1 = Agere;WL60040; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MC |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = ideally [http://wireless.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/wlags49_h2 wlags49_h25], [[Probable Linux driver::none|but no firmware and perhaps no support]] |windriv = '''[https://deviwiki.com/files/Agere/Drivers/v8.24.0.629/ the latest Agere driver set (v8.24.0.629)] appears to have support for this card'''
STA, IBSS (2.4GHz only), and AP (2.4GHz only) modes appear to be supported from within Windows |is_manuf = No |manuf = USI |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abg |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/27/2004 |estreldate = |price = |upc = 647030012605 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0007SL4HS |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = Taiwan |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This card identifies in Windows as a... *PCMCIA\Agere_Systems-Wireless_PC_Card_Model_0118-42F2 *PCMCIA\Agere_Systems-Wireless_PC_Card_Model_0118-0156-0004 The card does not identify as a PCI device when plugged in (despite the CardBus strip on the card).. but it does register as a PCMCIA device. "8U580" is on the board. ===Additional specifications=== These specifications are per the '''Enterasys''' datasheet. {{802dot11 RxSens|11a |6M=-85 |24M=-79 |54M=-68 }} {{802dot11 RxSens|11g |6M=-85 |24M=-79 |54M=-68 }} ==Links of Interest== [http://web.archive.org/web/20140613044402/http://images.cxtec.com/PDF/CABLETRON-RBTBH-R2W_DS.pdf Datasheeet (@ '''cxtec.com''', via '''archive.org''')] ==Pictures==
